page.title: 08Computer Chemistry
page.content:
Chemdata.
Mr Keat has a computer business called Chemdata.He makes programs and it takes about three years to make a big program and 1\ weeks to make a small program.He's been in the business for one year now and sends his programs to universities and coleges all over the country.He only has one computer at the moment but he is trying to buy another. He draws graphics on the screen of the computer,they represent molecules and atoms.He is a different chemist to the ones when you go into a shop and get medicines.Mr Keat is not a computer programer he researches into chemistry.Mr Keat used a computer about 1980 which is five years ago.Mr Keat gets bored with his computer.{
